Ingredients.5: 3 tablespoons vegan butter (such as Earth Balance®)

Ingredients.7: 1 cup cold unsweetened almond milk, or as needed

Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C). Line a baking pan with parchment paper or a nonstick silicone baking mat.

Directions.2: Whisk together flour, baking powder, sugar, and salt in a large bowl. Cut in vegan butter and coconut oil with a pastry blender or a fork until the mixture resembles coarse crumbs.

Directions.3: Slowly stir in cold almond milk, adding just enough for a wet and sticky dough to come together.

Directions.4: Turn dough out onto a lightly floured surface and knead (fold over) 15 times. Gently roll or pat dough to a thickness of 1 to 1 1/2 inches. Cut biscuits with a small biscuit cutter or a small bourbon glass. Gently re-roll dough scraps and cut remaining biscuits for a total of 12.

Directions.5: Place biscuits onto the prepared baking sheet so they are touching each other. Don't be afraid to squish them together as this helps them to rise even higher.

Directions.6: Bake in the preheated oven until the tops are golden brown, 12 to 15 minutes.
